sourcesContent:
<template>
	<ParentComponent
		ref="parentComponent"
		pageTitle="Economy of South Korea"
		divId="div1"
		selectContentClass="selectContent1"
		:linkedOutline="linkedOutline"
		@ready="handleComponentReady" />
</template>

<script setup>
	import { ref } from "vue";
	import ParentComponent from "@/components/compoents_base/ParentComponent.vue";

	const parentComponent = ref(null);
	const linkedOutline = [
		{ leftId: "heading-0-div1", rightId: "heading-0-div3" },
		{ leftId: "heading-10-div1", rightId: "heading-11-div3" }
	];

	// 示例高亮文本 - 替换为您需要高亮的实际段落
	const highlightTexts = [
		"It is included in the group of Next Eleven countries as having the potential to play a dominant role in the global economy by the middle of the 21st century",
		"South Korea's education system and the establishment of a motivated and educated populace were largely responsible for spurring the country's high technology boom and economic development"
	];

	const handleComponentReady = () => {
		// 组件加载完成后设置高亮
		if (parentComponent.value) {
			parentComponent.value.setHighlightedTexts(highlightTexts, "div1");
		}
	};

	// 暴露方法以便父组件调用
	defineExpose({
		setHighlight: texts => {
			if (parentComponent.value) {
				parentComponent.value.setHighlightedTexts(texts, "div1");
			}
		},
		clearHighlight: () => {
			if (parentComponent.value) {
				parentComponent.value.setHighlightedTexts([], "div1");
			}
		}
	});
</script>
